short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds browser-wide shortcuts to toggle microphone and camera in Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- shows microphone status in toolbar icon
- allows to toggle microphone and camera from toolbar icon's menu
- adds shortcuts to toggle microphone and camera, shortcuts work in any browser tab

No tracking, no ads, no cookies, no user data collection. Just plain and simple little extension.
